__note__: This is file is autogenerated, do not edit it manually. For more info https://data.aoe4world.com/

data.name: Adjustable Crossbars
data.description: Increases Mangonel range by +1, blast radius by +75%, and adds +1 projectile to attacks.

data.name: Angled Surfaces
data.description: Increase the ranged armor of all non-siege units by +1.

data.name: Armored Hull
data.description: Increase the health of all military ships by +20% and ranged armor by +1.

data.name: Arrowslits
data.description: Add defensive arrowslits to this structure and increase garrison arrow range by +1. Only one weapon emplacement can be added.

data.name: Balanced Projectiles
data.description: Increase the ranged damage of all arrows and bolts by +1.

data.name: Biology
data.description: Investing in natural sciences increases the health of all cavalry by +25%.

data.name: Bloomery
data.description: Increase the melee damage of all non-siege units by +1.

data.name: Boiling Oil
data.description: Towers and Keeps gain a boiling oil attack against nearby units that deals 30 damage.

data.name:
Advancement
(Bonus Culture Wing)
data.description:
Constructs the Culture Wing.
Build this wing to advance to the next Age in 20% less time and with 1300 less costs.

data.name:
Logistics
(Bonus Culture Wing)
data.description:
Constructs the Culture Wing.
Upon completion, grants 4 Dervish, improves the unit's healing by +50%, and turns it on permanently.

data.name:
Growth
(Bonus Economic Wing)
data.description:
Constructs the Economic Wing.
Upon completion, grants 10 Villagers and all Villagers work +10% faster.

data.name:
Industry
(Bonus Economic Wing)
data.description:
Constructs the Economic Wing.
Upon completion, awards 2800 Wood and 900 Stone. Villagers build +50% faster.

data.name:
Master Smiths
(Bonus Military Wing)
data.description:
Constructs the Military Wing.
Military Academy and the Blacksmith's damage and armor technologies become free and complete automatically when entering an Age. (Those of other Ages must still be researched as normal).

data.name:
Reinforcement
(Bonus Military Wing)
data.description:
Constructs the Military Wing.
Upon completion, Cavalry units gain the ability to construct siege weapons.
The House of Wisdom produces 7 Desert Raiders immediately and then every 2 minutes for the rest of the game.

data.name:
Advisors
(Bonus Trade Wing)
data.description:
Constructs the Trade Wing.
Upon completion, gain 7 Atabeg which can be garrisoned in any military production building (except Docks) to increase the health of newly trained units by 20%.

data.name:
Bazaar
(Bonus Trade Wing)
data.description:
Constructs the Trade Wing.
Every three minutes a trade caravan arrives with a random selection of four favorable exchanges of resources and units.
The quality of these trades is permanently set depending on the Age at which the Trade Wing is constructed. Using the Trade Wing to enter a later age provides more lucrative trades.

data.name: Cannon Emplacement
data.description: Add a defensive cannon emplacement to this structure.

data.name: Incendiaries
data.description: Incendiary Ships gain +20% explosion range.

data.description: Flammable munitions grant non-gunpowder ranged units a siege arrow or bolt when attacking buildings and increase their damage by +20%.

data.description: Infantry increase the armor of nearby camels by 3.

data.name: Professional Scouts
data.description:
Scouts gain the ability to carry animal carcasses and +100% damage against wild animals.
Scouts move -55% slower while carrying and cannot pick up Boar.

data.name: Roller Shutter Triggers
data.description: Increases Springald attack speed by +25% and grants +10% Ranged Resistance.

data.name: Serpentine Powder
data.description: With new gunpowder, Handcannoneers gain +5 damage against melee infantry and gain a brief increase to their movement speed after firing their weapon.

data.name: Siege Carpentry

data.description: New carpentry techniques increase the health of siege units by +20%.
